sentence.Network_en: Resourcefully he mingled music and dance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他非常聪明地把音乐和舞蹈结合在一起.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... resourceful 资源丰富的 resourcefully 机智地 resourcefulness 足智多谋.

auth_sentence.content: Most big illusions, similarly, involve a remarkably limited, though resourcefully manipulated, arsenal of mirrors and lights.
